title: Higher latitude chain (Lat -83.7, Long 88.7), Ground-based Vector Magnetic Field at PG5 site in Antarctica, 1-sec raw data. Instrument deployed in Jan 2016 under NSF awards ANT0839858, ATM922979 - C. R. Clauer (Virginia Tech.)

parameters.name: thg_mag_pg5
parameters.description: Variation in Magnetic field B in HDZ vector components

parameters.name: thg_magh_pg5
parameters.description: ---> H - Local magnetic North component of B. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function make_stack_array (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thg_mag_pg5']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thg_magd_pg5
parameters.description: ---> E - Local magnetic East component of B. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function make_stack_array (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thg_mag_pg5']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thg_magz_pg5
parameters.description: ---> Z - Local vertical down component of B. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function make_stack_array (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thg_mag_pg5']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
